thread.title_full: 40% Off 2nd Night at Four Points by Sheraton

title: 40% Off 2nd Night at Four Points by Sheraton
text:
Home > Hotel Deals > 40% Off 2nd Night at Four Points by Sheraton 40% Off 2nd Night at Four Points by Sheraton   - September 22, 2015 at 8:31 PM 
Guests at select Four Points properties receive up to 40 percent off the second night. Stay three nights and get the fourth up to 40 percent off! 
Some popular Four Points hotels include: Four Points by Sheraton Chicago Downtown - Magnificent Mile Four Points by Sheraton Denver Southeast Four Points by Sheraton Manhattan Chelsea Four Points by Sheraton San Diego Four Points by Sheraton Pittsburgh Airport 
How to get this deal: For more information or to book, visit the Free Breakfast page on the Starwood Hotels/Four Points by Sheraton website. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
